bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR FACILITATING GAME PLAY AND GENERATING AN AUTHENTICATABLE AUDIT-TRAIL

abstract.p: A remote gaming systems whereby a player can gamble against a wagering establishment or state-run lottery from a remote location on a personal computer or portable computer device where it is unnecessary to establish an on-line connection with a host computer associated with the wagering establishment, the gaming computer having associated gaming software for providing at least one wagering opportunity and enabling the player to obtain gambling credit and cash-out any resulting winnings, the host computer enabling the player to purchase and redeem gambling credit at the remote location in one embodiment of the invention using cryptographic protocols such as through a series of authenticatable message exchanges between the player and the wagering establishment, the gaming computer and the host computer directly on-line, or the gaming computer having a detachable tamper-resistant or tamper-evident credit module associated therewith or for use with a personal computer being provided to the player with preinstalled or preloaded gambling credit, the gaming system also enabling participation in future events of which the outcome is uncertain such as, for example, a lottery whereby the player makes selections on a gaming computer at a remote location.

De uitvinding betreft een spelsysteem waarbij een speler op afstand kan gokken met een gok- of-loterij-instelling met behulp van een door de speler te bedienen spelcomputer en de gastcomputer van de gok- of loterij-instelling, waarbij het niet noodzakelijk is dat de spelcomputer en de gastcomputer rechtstreeks met elkaar in verbinding staan. De spelcomputer kan voorzien van tenminste één weddenschapmogelijkheid alsook een mogelijkheid om aan de speler krediet te verlenen alsook aan de speler zijn winst uit te keren, en waarbij de gastcomputer de speler in staat stelt krediet te kopen en af te lossen via een aantal specifieke codes die tussen de speler en gokinstelling worden uitgewisseld.

Eventueel kan de spelcomputer zijn voorzien van een door de gokinstelling geleverde kredietmodule die aangesloten wordt op de huiscomputer van de speler, waarbij de uitwisseling van de soort van weddenschap en het benodigde krediet geregeld wordt door de module en de huiscomputer met behulp van diverse codes overeenkomstig een nadere afspraak tussen d gokinstelling en de speler.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Sistema de jogar computador de jogar para emprego num sistema de jogar e método de jogar

abstract.p: A remote gaming system whereby a player can gamble against a wagering establishment or state-run lottery from a remote location on a personal computer or portable computer device where it is unnecessary to establish an on-line connection with a host computer associated with the wagering establishment, the gaming computer providing at least one wagering opportunity and enabling the player to obtain credit and cash-out any resulting winnings, the host computer enabling the player to purchase and redeem credit at the remote location through a series of encrypted code eschanges between the player and the wagering establishment, or alternatively the gaming computer or a credit module for use with a personal computer being provided to the player with pre-installed credit, the gaming system also enabling participation in future events of which the outcome is uncertain such as, for esample,
a lottery whereby the player makes selections on a gaming computer at a remote location.

applicant-name.name: WALKER ASSET MANAGEMENT LTD. PARTNERSHIP, NEW CANAAN, CONN., US

abstract.p: In a remote gaming system a player (12) can gamble against a wagering establishment or state-run lottery (16) from a remote location on a personal computer or portable computer device (14) where it is unnecessary to establish an on-line connection with a host computer (30) associated with the wagering establishment (16). The gaming computer (14) provides at least one wagering opportunity and enables the player (12) to obtain credit and cash-out any resulting winnings, and the host computer (30) enables the player (12) to purchase and redeem credit at the remote location through a series of encrypted code exchanges between the player (12) and the wagering establishment (16). Alternatively the gaming computer (14) or a credit module for use with a personal computer is provided for the player (12), with pre-installed credit. The gaming system (10) also enables participation in for example, a lottery whereby the player (12) makes selections on a gaming computer (14) at a remote location. <IMAGE>

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Système amélioré de jeux à distance.

abstract.p: La présente invention concerne un système de jeu à distance par lequel un joueur peut parier contre un établissement de jeux (16) ou une loterie d'état à partir d'un emplacement situé à distance, sur un dispositif (14) formant ordinateur personnel ou ordinateur portable, dans lequel il n'est pas nécessaire d'établir une connexion en ligne avec un ordinateur central (30) associé à l'établissement de jeux (16). L'ordinateur (14) fournit au moins une opportunité de pari et permet au parieur d'obtenir un crédit et d'encaisser ses gains, l'ordinateur (30) lui permettant d'acheter et d'encaisser un crédit au niveau de l'emplacement situé à distance par l'intermédiaire d'une série d'échanges de codes cryptés entre le joueur (12) et l'établissement de jeux (16).

applicant-name.name: WALKER ASSET MANAGEMENT LIMITED PAR TNERSHIP,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SISTEMA PER IL GIOCO D'AZZARDO A DISTANZA MIGLIORATO

abstract.p: E' descritto un sistema per il gioco d'azzardo a distanza nel quale un giocatore può giocare d'azzardo contro un istituto di scommessa o una lotteria di stato da una località remota o distante su un personal computer o un dispositivo calcolatore portatile ove non è necessario instaurare un collegamento in linea con un calcolatore ospite associato con l'istituto di scommessa, il calcolatore per il gioco d'azzardo fornendo almeno un'opportunità di scommessa e abilitando il giocatore a ottenere credito e a incassare qualunque vincita risultante, il calcolatore ospite abilitando il giocatore ad acquistare e riscattare credito nella località remota attraverso una serie d scambi di codice crittografato fra il giocatore e l'istituto di scommessa,

o alternativamente il calcolatore per il gioco d'azzardo o un modulo di credito per l'uso con un personal computer essendo forniti al giocatore con credito preinstallato, il sistema per il gioco d'azzardo abilitando anche la partecipazione a eventi futuri dei quali è incerto il risultato come, per esempio, una lotteria nella quale il giocatore fa selezioni su un calcolatore per il gioco d'azzardo in una probabilità remota.

applicant-name.name: WALKER ASSET MANAGEMENT LIMITED PAR TNERSHIP,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SISTEMA PER IL GIOCO D'AZZARDO A DISTANZA MIGLIORATO

abstract.p: A remote gaming system whereby a player can gamble against a wagering establishment or state-run lottery from a remote location on a personal computer or portable computer device where it is unnecessary to establish an on-line connection with a host computer associated with the wagering establishment, the gaming computer having associated gaming software for providing at least one wagering opportunity and enabling the player to obtain gambling credit and cash-out any resulting winnings, the host computer enabling the player to purchase and redeem gambling credit at the remote location in one embodiment of the invention using cryptographic protocols such as through a series of encrypted message exchanges between the player and the wagering establishment.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: REMOTE GAME DEVICE, GAME COMPUTER, GAME METHOD AND GAME DEVICE

abstract.p: PURPOSE: To obtain a remote game to enable player to play a game to a game facility or a lottery from a remote place using a personal computer, etc., when on-line connection to a host computer relating the game facility is not required. CONSTITUTION: A player 12 accesses a game computer 14 with an image display device 18 and a keyboard 18. Then the game computer 14 actuates a software 22 comprising a bank program 26 and a auditory program 27. On the other hand, a game software 33 containing a bank program 35 and an auditory program 37 is mounted on a computer 30 on a game facility 16. The computer 30 contains a dedicated device or software to perform coding and decoding algorithm known only by the game facility 16 and communicates with those device or software. Further, a player 12 and an agent 36 communicate with each other through telephones 36, 40.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Système amélioré de jeux à distance
System for fjernbasert deltagelse i spill

abstract.p: Et fjernbasert hasardsplllsystem der en spiller kan spille mot en veddemålsetabllssenent eller statlig drevetlotteri fra et fjerntliggende sted på en personlig datamaskin (14) eller bärbar datamasklnanordning der det erunödvendig å etablere en dlrektekoblet forbindelse med en vert-datamaskln som er tilhörende veddemåletabllsse-mentet (16), Idet hasardspllldatamasklnen (14) tllvelebrlnger minst en veddemålmulighet og setter spilleren lstand til å oppnå kreditt og Innkassere eventuell resulterende gevinster, Idet vert-datamasklnen (30) setterspilleren l stand til å kjöpe og Innlöse kreditt på det fjerntliggende stedet gjennom en rekke av sifrertekodeutvekslInger mellom spilleren (12) og veddemålsetabllssementet (16), eller alternativt at hasardsplll-datamasklnen (14)

eller en kredlttmodul for bruk med en personlig datamaskin er tilvelebragt for spilleren medforutinstallert kreditt, Idet hasardspillsystemet også muliggjör deltagelse l fremtidige begivenheter derutfallet er uvisst, slik som eksempelvis et lotteri der spilleren foretar utvalg på en hasardspllldatamaskln pået fjerntliggende sted.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Systeme ameliore de jeux a distance
SISTEMA APERFEICOADO DE JOGO DE AZAR A DISTANCIA, COMPUTADOR E PROCESSO DE JOGAR NELE UTILIZADOS

applicant-name.name: UOLKER EHSSET MEHNEDZHMENT LTD PARTNERSHIP US

bibliographic-data.invention-title: GAME SYSTEM, GAME COMPUTER, METHOD FOR PLAYING OR DRAWING LOTTERY WHEN PLAYER PARTICIPATES IN IT

abstract.p: FIELD: games. SUBSTANCE: player takes part in stake game against institution or state which draws lottery by means of remote personal or notebook computer which establishes dialog connection to server which is connected to institution which made its bet. Game system has game computer which stores at least one case which satisfies bet and provides player with possibility to be credited or to receive cash for arbitrary wins he makes in result. In addition device has server computer which provides player with possibility to buy or to return credit in remote mode by means of series of exchanges of encoded information between player and institution which made its bet. Another claim of invention describes device which has game computer or credit unit which interacts to personal computer and provides player with preliminary determined level of credit. In addition game system provides possibility for participation in future events which result remains undetermined. Such events include lottery. Player makes his choice on remote game computer. EFFECT: increased functional capabilities.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEME AMELIORE DE JEU A DISTANCE

abstract.p: A remote gaming system whereby a player (12) can gamble against a wagering establishment (16) or lottery from a remote location on a personal computer or portable computer device (14) where it is unnecessary to establish an on-line connection with a host computer associated with the wagering establishment, the gaming computer providing at least one wagering opportunity and enabling the player to obtain credit and cash-out any winnings, the host computer (30) enabling the player to purchase and redeem credit at the remote location through a series of encrypted code exchanges between the player and the wagering establishment, or alternatively the gaming computer or a credit module for use with a personal computer being provided to the player with pre-installed credit.

Système de jeu à distance selon lequel un joueur (12) peut parier, depuis un lieu éloigné, contre un établissement (16) parieur ou une loterie sur un ordinateur personnel ou un ordinateur portable (14) sans qu'il soit nécessaire d'établir une connexion directe avec un ordinateur serveur associé à l'établissement parieur, l'ordinataur de jeu offrant au moins une chance de parier et permettant au joueur de gagner du crédit et d'encaisser les éventuels gains, l'ordinateur serveur (30) permettant au joueur d'acheter du crédit et de le rembourser à l'endroit éloigné au moyen d'une série d'échanges de codes codés entre le joueur et l'établissement parieur, ou bien encore l'ordinateur de jeu ou un module de crédit utilisable avec un ordinateur portable étant fourni au joueur avec un crédit pré-intégré.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEME DE JEU A DISTANCE PERFECTIONNE ET PROTEGE

abstract.p: A remote gaming system whereby a player can gamble against a wagering establishment (16) or state-run lottery from a remote location on a personal computer or portable computer device (14) where it is unnecessary to establish an on-line connection with a host computer associated with the wagering establishment, the gaming computer having gaming software (22) for providing a wagering opportunity and enabling the player to obtain gambling credit and cash-out any winnings, the host computer (30) enabling the player to purchase and redeem gambling credit at the remote lcoation using cryptographic protocols through a series of authenticatable message exchanges between the player and the establishment, the gaming computer and the host computer directly on-line, or the gaming computer having a detachable tamper-resistant or tamper-evident credit module associated therewith or for use with a personal computer being provided to the player with preloaded gambling credit.

Système de jeu à distance, selon lequel un joueur peut parier contre un établissement de jeu (16) ou participer à une loterie nationale à partir d'un endroit éloigné par l'intermédiaire d'un ordinateur personnel ou d'un dispositif informatique portable (14), et dans lequel il n'est pas nécessaire d'établir une connexion directe avec un ordinateur central associé à l'établissement de jeu. L'ordinateur de jeu comprend un logiciel de jeu (22) offrant au joueur la possibilité de parier et lui permettant d'obtenir un crédit de jeu et de toucher ses gains.

L'ordinateur central (30) permet au joueur d'acheter et de faire valoir des crédits de jeu au niveau de l'endroit éloigné au moyen de protocoles cryptographiques et par une série d'échanges de messages authentifiables entre le joueur et l'établissement, ou par connexion directe entre l'ordinateur de jeu et l'ordinateur central. Selon une variante, l'ordinateur de jeu comprend un module de crédit amovible et inviolable qui lui est associé ou qui peut être utilisé avec un ordinateur personnel attribué au joueur avec un crédit de jeu préchargé.
